abstract: Utah lawmakers introduce bill that prohibits discrimination in housing or employment basd on gender identity or sexual orientation; bill provides exemptions for Boy Scouts and religious groups.
lead_paragraph: Lawmakers introduced a bill Wednesday that protects against gender discrimination while also carving out protections for the Boy Scouts and religious groups.
snippet: Lawmakers introduced a bill Wednesday that protects against gender discrimination while also carving out protections for the Boy Scouts and religious groups.

keywords.value: Mormons (Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints)
keywords.name: subject
